thread.title: TV cameraman distracted by Patricia Martinez's boobs as she poses in low-cut gold swimsuit on Spanish diving show
thread.title_full: TV cameraman distracted by Patricia Martinez's boobs as she poses in low-cut gold swimsuit on Spanish diving show

title: TV cameraman distracted by Patricia Martinez's boobs as she poses in low-cut gold swimsuit on Spanish diving show
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A RAUNCHY clip has resurfaced online that shows a TV cameraman lingering his shot on a swimsuit-clad reality star’s boobs. 
Patricia Martinez was participating in Look Who’s Jumping! – Spain’s version of the now defunct ITV reality show, Splash! – in 2014 when she dazzled judges with an awe-inspiring dive. Look Who Jumps! 4 Patricia Martinez steps out of the pool in a low-cut, see-through swimsuit 
But when the brunette stepped out of the swimming pool in a gold, low-cut one-piece, which showcased her voluptuous chest, a member of the film crew struggled to compose himself. 
As the panel of judges discussed Patricia’s technique, the camera operator suddenly zoomed into her soaking-wet swimsuit. 
He panned the camera slowly up and down her body, before quickly cutting to the judges. Look Who Jumps! The cameraman kept his lens fixated on the reality star’s chest TV camera man distracted by Patricia Martinez's chest on diving reality show 
Patricia, who has previously been linked to Spanish polo player Alvaro Munoz Escassi, finished the competition in fourth place. 
She was beaten by Sergi Capdevila, the son of Spanish singer Sergio Dalma. 
Meanwhile, Splash! ran for two seasons in the UK between 2013 and 2014. Related Stories 'World's sexiest weathergirl' turns up in disguise at comic convention dressed as batgirl It's a bit nippy Sexy weather girl suffers an embarrassing wardrobe malfunction thanks to a transparent blouse It's hotting up! Weather girl STRIPS down to a skimpy orange bikini while presenting a heatwave report what a hero! Weather girl suffers an embarrassing nipple slip in racy Wonder Woman costume Fitness first Now the 'world's sexiest weather girl' is showing off her gym technique on Instagram Look Who Jumps! Patricia dazzled the judges with her awe-inspiring dive - and enviable figure Look Who Jumps! Patricia finished in fourth place on the diving reality show 
It was presented by Gabby Logan, Vernon Kay and Olympian Tom Daley. 
Eddie ‘The Eagle’ Edwards, Linda Barker, Jake Canuso, Perri Kiely and Keith Duffy were some of the famous faces who took part. 
But this isn’t the first cameraman hitting the headlines. 
This Morning camera operator Pete bid farewell to the ITV show on Friday – much to the dismay of his fans. 
Pete shot to fame after Holly Willoughby tried to bag him a date on the daytime programme in May.
